results.title: Yesterday
results.creator_credit: Gordon White and Associates, Gordon White and Conrad Standish
results.brief_description: A young boy of the 1670’s wanders through the Swan Hill Pioneer Settlement and views some characteristic features of life there in the past. Residents of the Settlement in period costume, an old steamboat - the Pyap - journeying down the Murray River, horse-drawn coaches, and colonial buildings, all contribute to this picture of yesterday’s Swan Hill. Accompanied by instrumental folk music.

results.title: Yes, Virginia, there is a Santa Claus
results.creator_credit: Wolper Productions, Bill Melendez, Mort Green and Tom Keegan
results.brief_description: The story of eight-year-old Virginia O’Hanlon who tries every source to find out if there really is a Santa Claus and finally writes to the editor of the New York Sun for her answer. Suitable for primary level.

results.title: Yes, Prime Minister. The key. A real partnership. A victory.
results.brief_description: Following prolonged exposure to the Civil service, embodied by the scheming Sir Humphrey Appleby, now in the exalted position of Cabinet Secretary, Britain’s top civil servant, it is as Premier that Hacker begins to find his feet as a man of some importance and to confound those used to manipulating him with such ease. Features three episodes: The key, A real partnership and A victory for democracy.

results.title: Yes, Prime Minister. The Grand Design
results.brief_description: Following his stout stand against Eurosausage, The Rt. Hon. James Hacker PC, Mp, BSc (Econ), being of that simple, direct, noble breed of men called politicians, was propelled along the corridors of power to the very pinnacle of politics - No. 10. Fortunately for the country, his scheming adversary Sir Humphrey - now in the exalted position of Cabinet Secretary - proves more than willing to steer the unsteady ship of state through the perilous waters of government. Features three episodes: The grand design, The ministerial broadcast, The smoke screen.

results.title: Yes or no, Jean-Guy Moreau
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Judith Vecchione, Tina Viljoen, Barrie Howells and Michael Rubbo
results.brief_description: Jean-Guy Moreau is a Quebecois impersonator and political satirist who rises far above the level of being merely funny. In this film he prepares to perform in English before a Toronto audience. He will impersonate Premier Rene Levesque conducting a press conference. Moreau becomes so caught up with his subject that at times his personality merges with that of Levesque, as he fends off the questions of an equally involved audience.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Judith Vecchione, Tina Viljoen, Barrie Howells and Michael Rubbo

results.title: Yes Minister : the compassionate society
results.brief_description: Jim Hacker has been Minister of Administrative affairs long enough to know he must come up with fresh ideas to show his electorate he is successful. His Permanent Secretary, the urbane Sir Humphrey is there to make sure they never come to fruition, while poor old Bernard must sit uneasily on the fence between them. Features three episodes, “The Compassionate Society”, in which the minister is obsessed about a new hospital with no patients…. “Doing the Honours”, in which the minister has trouble enforcing budget cuts… “The Death List”, in which the minister changes his attitude about buying bugging devices when he hears he’s down for assassination by a terrorist group.

results.title: Yen Family = Kimura-Ke No Hitobi To
results.creator_credit: Fuji Television Productions, Melies, Shuji Miyajima, Shinya Kawai and Yojiro Takita
results.brief_description: In Japan today everyone is looking for ways to increase their wealth and assets, but the Kimura family is particularly determined - in fact it is abnormally determined - to accumulate wealth. They don’t want a palatial mansion, they have no outstanding loans and they are not planning to travel abroad. They just love money so much that they work day and night for even the smallest amounts. And of course nothing is allowed to go to waste.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Fuji Television Productions, Melies, Shuji Miyajima, Shinya Kawai and Yojiro Takita

results.title: Yellow trail from Texas
results.brief_description: Despite the hard work and nomadic life style of wheat harvest crews as they travel from Texas to Canada. Considers the implications of the harvest on the ecomony and nutritional health of the world.

results.title: Yellow earth
results.brief_description: Despite several decades of communist rule in China, the peasantry in many places and in many ways remained nearly as backward and poor as before “liberation.” This drama is about a young girl from a poor family, trapped and trying to escape from that way of life and an arranged marriage. One of the most important films of the Chinese new wave. In Mandarin with English subtitles.
